website_summaries.verdict: It's not a practical choice for some users, but it does a good job for those with very short hair.
pros: With its 1-inch barrel and slim design, it's a nice round brush for styling very short hair and a good pick for men's styles
The size and ball-tipped bristles are ideal for adding body and lift
cons: Gets tangled very easily in longer hair
A bit stiff, and bristles can fall out over time

customer_reviews.title: Got stuck in my hair a few times
customer_reviews.text: Because the brush is very thin, my hair was getting tangled up to the point where it has gotten stuck in my hair for a few minutes trying to detangle everything. You have to be a little careful when using, but I think because its so thin, it might not be the best product for hair over 5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: KBazan

customer_reviews.title: Painful for your scalp and your wallet
customer_reviews.text: What a terrible brush. Hard plastic handle. Not pleasant to hold. And if you have thin short hair this isn’t for you. This brush is for thicker hair. The brittles are wide apart for people with lack of follicles. And the brittles feels very stiff on your scalp. Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: K. Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: After 3 years of usage...
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years of usage, the brush and the handle snapped in half. I had hair product in my hair when I went to comb it. The red rubber is concealing the thickness of plastic (it's a bit smaller than the handle). If you purchase it; trying to pry the rubber grip and you will see what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiff-y
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what is advertise, will give you a huge lift in the front. It carries hair so exact so you can get what you really need. The down side is that it can pull a little if you're not careful. I think that's more so for the user to up with. I have a bigger brush from the 90s that I used alot before buying this one, but that one is smoother. All in all, great tool to style hair, and I would over all recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Demetri

customer_reviews.title: No elegible for return item. Watch the seller polocy please.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know is an un returnable item this is trash cheap material. Now i don't know what to do with it. I am stock up with something not as expected
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.verygood

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Gatbage. Tangles in anything over 1 inch. I took me half an hour to untangle my daughters hair. And ot kept tangling in my beard. Dont care for my money. I threw it in the trash better so no one ever has to use this one again. Better world with one less crappy brush
customer_reviews.author: Manny C.

customer_reviews.title: great brush for men with short hair who want to ...
customer_reviews.text: great brush for men with short hair who want to blow dry for added volume/smoothness. The only problem i had was that the "rubber dots" for finger traction would sometimes catch a hair or two that came to close to it when blowdrying and would yank them
customer_reviews.author: Adam E

customer_reviews.title: Know how to use it before you buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is for short-haired people for sure! If you are buying this for long hair and heavy use, this isn't for you. This brush was made for styling shorter hair, like a men’s cut or pixie style, even thin hair. It is easy to hold and easy to use. Really grabs your hair. A lot of reviews talk about having it stuck in the hair, while this can be true (it’s happened to me), you need to understand how to use it first, if your hair gets stuck just unroll it and pull out gently. I’ve had success with it and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to hold, good for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this comb I immediately decided to try it out on my dry bed hair. It almost got stuck and entangled in it... So I took a shower, dried my hair, and tried to comb again. No problems. The comb’s bristles are soft, they flow through my layers just fine. I’m able to lift my hair to give it some more volume just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paredes Home

customer_reviews.title: Right Radius 4 Shorter Hair
customer_reviews.text: Didn't I already review this product? This one is very well constructed and should last a long time. Just the right radius for shorter hair.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B. Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Designed for short, thick, blown-out hair
customer_reviews.text: Ok here's the thing - many of the negative reviews are from people with long or thin hair. This kind of brush isn't really made for that - it's designed for thicker and shorter hair that is being treated with a blow dryer. The same thin features that make it catch on long hair is what makes it effective at "lifting" thick hair so the blow dryer can treat it. I'll admit that this brush used to have larger red dots at the end, which made it more comfortable, but for a $12 brush you can't really expect this thing to do heavy lifting.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality brush. Many of the ends are not coated on the ends and many that were are done in an irregular shape or the coating dropped down the bristle and now rests below the end. Overall has the look and feel of something found buried at the back of a dollar store shelf
customer_reviews.author: CozyHiki

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Hair Brush for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: Never really used a hair brush before because I hated how they felt running through my hair. Got turned onto this brush through a youtube video that suggested some techniques for thinning hair. This brush is awesome. It hardly pulls any hair, and works with when used with a blowdryer and fluffing up thinning hair.
customer_reviews.author: SHANE

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle
customer_reviews.text: This brush works well with a hair dryer, but you should be careful not to wrap too much hair around it/use on longer hair. It tends to get stuck a bit, possibly due to it being slim and catching too much hair.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: give it a shot!!!
customer_reviews.text: i enjoyed how easy this makes styling my hair, however if you have thick and course hair BE CAREFULLLLLL tends to get tangled of im rushing in the morning, A. it hurts B. can sometimes be time consuming to free your hair w/o ripping a fat chunk out!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Trifoni

customer_reviews.title: Great little brush
customer_reviews.text: This little roller brush is extremely well designed. It slips through your hair easily, aids styling perfectly, is small for travel, and is perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.author: MayoufromBayou

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a brush this size. Wish it was better quality because it worked well in the beginning for a couple days but the red dots start falling off. More expensive than other brushes but not last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Karthikeyan Rajmohan

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for straight medium, long and short hair. Feels very good when you're using it, good grip but i feel like it's a bit short. very satisfied though
customer_reviews.author: Noah Polat

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes a certain type of brush & I accidentally threw his favorite one away. This one is totally perfect & he has forgiven me! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: 408chaos

customer_reviews.title: Great brush
customer_reviews.text: Great brush for untangling thick wavy hair. Also good for styling a blowout. The only downside i would say is that the handle is a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Byrone

customer_reviews.title: Great for Styling/Spiking Hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush helps a lot with spiking my hair up. It also brushes my hair very well even without product! My hair is really hard to style. If a regular brush does not work for you, I would recommend this brush!
customer_reviews.author: khurram

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My husband’s barber uses one of these. I searched Amazon, found this and it works great! I use it too! Nice plastic brush that doesn’t snag or tangle!
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: I had been using my wifes brush until she took it away
customer_reviews.text: Firm bristals make combing my wet hair back with ease. I keep my hair shorter than most and this is a really great brush
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I almost had to cut this out of my hair. The fear level that came over me after one little tiny twist of that brush was too much. It reminds me of my maw maws wig brush.. not designed for real hair.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, bristles are very thin, but it does the job
customer_reviews.author: Queens, NY Customer

customer_reviews.title: How easy to use and it works great!
customer_reviews.text: How easy it was to use! I bought it to help with my mustache and beard. Works very good. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Heaston II

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great brush, gives me just enough volume, but not too much like a larger brush does.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a good roundbrush for the money, but if you blow dry your hair to style it and have many cowlicks that don't cooperate like I do I would consider spending a little more to get a boars hair brush
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Does the job at a very good price, I use it for my beard and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great for thicker hair types!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best round brush I've ever used for styling my hair (I have short, thick hair that I style up)! Gives me a ton of volume easily. One downside though, the brush might be a little too harsh for thinner hair types since it does get a very strong grip on your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tomer Krayzman

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long but worked well in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a brush this size. Did well for a couple months but the red dots start falling off or sliding down after a while. I purchased in May 2017 and 75% of the red dots slid off. Wish it was better quality because it worked well in the beginning. More expensive than other brushes so I thought it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Nabil

customer_reviews.title: The little balls came off in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I have had this brush for less than a year and the little balls have come off and the brush is scratchy and can't be used anymore. I barely use this brush, and I have straight hair, it is not like I worked it hard. It just didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Eitel

customer_reviews.title: This Brush works well on short hair.
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy I found this Brush on Amazon. Works well and does not pull hair.
customer_reviews.author: deedee47

customer_reviews.title: -1 for every bristle that was missing from brush
customer_reviews.text: It’s broken upon arrival but no pieces in the box. Does the manufacturer not have a QC dept?
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great Personal care item
customer_reviews.text: I have thinner/finer hair and this works better for me than a typical comb.
customer_reviews.author: Shanta Rashid

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean, light weight and easy to travel with
customer_reviews.author: GLODNY

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick, smooth styling in the barbershop! I use those daily to style short hair and it’s an easy product to recommend to guys and gals who are new to styling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good brush for lucious hair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect brush. Seller sent item super fast. Will buy again if dog chews the new brush
customer_reviews.author: Hborn

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and works well. Bought it for use with a hair dryer for my beard.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker_t3

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but it’s a beast.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing brush for the money, I’m a barber and it’s great for styling hair and to blow out beards as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should! Be careful if you have long hair, you could get stuck as with any round brush.
customer_reviews.author: Jngo

customer_reviews.title: Great brush when hair starts growing after chemo
customer_reviews.text: I needed something small for styling my short hair after chemo. This worked great
customer_reviews.author: katgilm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my thin short hair, to give lots of texture and body.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Eardley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS COMB and use it every day with a blow dryer on my beard.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan

customer_reviews.title: If your hair is over 4 inches, find a larger diameter brush
customer_reviews.text: My hair is 4 to 5 inches and the diameter of this brush is still too small for my hair length.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Might not be best for thicker hair.
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work out for me, but my wife ended up liking it. It just got tangled in my hair, and didn’t give me the control I needed. My wife has enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Benton Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: My barber recommended a brush like this and its such a handy tool to style your hair!
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Feels pretty cheap at first but is pretty decent with quality. If you’re looking for a cheap brush that’ll get the job done and last a while then here ya go.
customer_reviews.author: Austin ciaccio

customer_reviews.title: Needed a brush for styling hair
customer_reviews.text: This made my combover look more polished and detailed! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shehub

customer_reviews.title: Good brush. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Good brush. I use it on my beard and it does the trick. I bought a second to keep in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: JamesYoung

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not a great brush, doesnt seem to be able to comb through hair and gets tangled in hair easily
customer_reviews.author: Eric G

customer_reviews.title: Total value for money
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. It does it's job very well
customer_reviews.author: Abuarshad

customer_reviews.title: Comb is a mans comb! Helps you look profesh as a MahFuckah!
customer_reviews.text: Nice if you wanna look fly as a mahfuckin kite.
customer_reviews.author: Shnalls

customer_reviews.title: Solid Brush For Males
customer_reviews.text: It's a brush and does what it should. I have no issues with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Audioguy

customer_reviews.title: spokes
customer_reviews.text: the spokes didn't work for my hair so i returned it
customer_reviews.author: Dhaval

customer_reviews.title: size and easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I have very short hair and it works prefect just the right size. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Golightly

customer_reviews.title: !Great seller
customer_reviews.text: .Good quality. The full and true description of the item. The item was delivered very fast. I recommend everyone
customer_reviews.author: PolinaPolonka

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY!!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this in June 2020 and is already missing 50% of the red dots therefore I have been scratching my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for mens styling!
customer_reviews.text: So nice to have. I have fine curly hair and want to have straight hair with a bit of volume. WORKS great!
customer_reviews.author: Lost in Japan

customer_reviews.title: Good for adding volume
customer_reviews.text: Works great and a good price. Adds good volume to my thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Brush romance
customer_reviews.text: This brush violated my hair in a good way. This brush will love you forever
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy C Haire

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: It’s a round brush and it performs like a round brush. Nothing more, nothing less.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Druzynski

customer_reviews.title: Good brush, works great for my wavy hairstyle
customer_reviews.text: Good brush , works great for my wavy hairstyle !
customer_reviews.author: AminZ

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Best hair comb/brush I've ever used! (male with thick, medium length hair)
customer_reviews.author: Ty Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Used for over a year!
customer_reviews.text: Used for more than a year now and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: chris Lindblad

customer_reviews.title: Trusted comb of myself and my barber
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this comb after a couple visits to my barber where he used one. You can use this without a hair dryer, but where it really shines is when you combine it with a focused hair dryer. I barely use gel on standard days anymore as the comb and my hair dryer lock everything in place. Healthier hair and less cost you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality & Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Used this comb 3 times and it’s falling apart already. Terrible quality
customer_reviews.author: antonios katsigiannis

customer_reviews.title: Solid brush
customer_reviews.text: Cool little brush for getting a good curl and volume to hair. Fun to have for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Sullivan, G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great on what hair I have. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent styling brush
customer_reviews.text: Excellent styling brush that makes it easy to work short hair.
customer_reviews.author: DENNIS

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a great value
customer_reviews.text: Good brush. Feels sturdy and works effectively for guys trying to get that coiffe while blow drying
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for short hair! Got it because my hair is thinning and works amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great brush -- highly recommend it to those that want that natural look to their hair :)
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Using it every day. It works well to style ...
customer_reviews.text: Using it every day. It works well to style short hairs. One of reasons I chose it is it is similar to the one my barber is using.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great grip, love using this to blow dry my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great grip, love using this to blow dry my hair up for a pomp. Easy to use and the price is amazing for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mattthew Cerda

customer_reviews.title: Good solid hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: I have thick hair and have always struggled to find a comb or brush that can shape my hair, but this brush does it well. The brush is made of high quality bristles and the ends don't fall off easily like they do on low quality brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Manish

customer_reviews.title: Love this brush
customer_reviews.text: Love this brush. My barber used it often when styling my hair and I eventually needed to have it. Great for pompadours or a swept hair look. Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!! Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: This brush got stuck in my hair when I used it to give volume to my shorter hair in the back. I thought I had to cut it out of my hair! After 10 minutes off gently pulling my hair out of it bit by bit, I freed it from my hair. It now goes in the trash! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Appletje

customer_reviews.title: Great for men's haircuts that need volume
customer_reviews.text: This little brush is great for adding volume to a blo-dried men's hairstyle. The smaller diameter makes it great for shorter haircuts. I saw other reviews questioning the quality of this brush. I've used it everyday for over a year and have had no quality issues. There is some hair buildup around the brush that is to be expected with this type of brush. Also for the price it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Must have brush for guys with style
customer_reviews.text: This type of brush is a must have for guys who want to have add a little style to their hair. It is so comfortable to roll and is great at shaping hair while brushes and combs can really only push hair back or forward. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Persons

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece for the comb/brush collection
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little brush. I use it to curl my hair a bit in the front before i put any product into it to give it more shape. It definitely helps when you have your hair cut shorter than normal.
customer_reviews.author: MegaManZan

customer_reviews.title: Good For Short Hair
customer_reviews.text: Small roller is excellent for short hair. It is helpful in creating exciting hair styles for both men and women. I recommend everyone with short hair owning one.
customer_reviews.author: GJE

customer_reviews.title: not the quality of a 12 dollar brush. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: not the quality of a 12 dollar brush. It's an average brush, I would consider paying a few bucks for it..not 12
customer_reviews.author: Vickster

customer_reviews.title: Good Brush
customer_reviews.text: Good, but does not work for my shorter, thicker hair all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Raymund C. Vergara

customer_reviews.title: This guy approves
customer_reviews.text: I am a guy and found this was perfect for combing and styling. It has a rubber grip that makes the comb easy to handle and the bristles are perfect for combing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Decent for blow drying/styling
customer_reviews.text: It works well but wish it was a little larger in circumference. Will work better on shorter hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ahad A.

customer_reviews.title: Dirty and unusable
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in unusable condition. Was unsanitary with hair stuck on it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E. Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Worst brush ever !
customer_reviews.text: My son was stuck for 27 hours so far and is still stuck with the brush to his hair. We can't take it out and refuse to cut his hair. This product is cheap damaged goods! Horrible experience. It should be taken off the market immediately. We are about to sue the company!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: The Bristles Fall Apart!!! Poor Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The red ball points at the end of the comb fell off after 3 weeks of daily use. I have normal hair and certainly did not put this comb in any out of the ordinary abuse. This comb was poorly made and poor quality. Do not buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cee4278

customer_reviews.title: Brush Works Great, But Snapped in Half Easily - No Return Policy
customer_reviews.text: The brush works fantastically. Only issue - I've only had it for a week now, and have been very gently using it - the wood core of the brush snapped while using it one day, right where the red rubber is in the center. The brush doesn't fall apart, since the outer layer of the red rubber stays connected, but the inside core is broken in half, meaning the brush isn't straight/firm anymore, and it's like you're holding 2 pieces of wood, held together by tape in the center. And, they have no returns on this item. So I can't really even really use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent manly brush
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for something like this for quite some time. It's smaller than I expected, but man does it work. This thing does such an amazing job at grabbing hairs, making it easy to style and give volume to your hair, you really have to try it to believe it.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brush for beard shaping
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brush to manage my beard as it's reached the point of needing to be blow dried and shaped. This brush is tiny and is perfect for a medium length beard. It will grip your hair as long as you have an average to thick beard but it yours is on the thinner side it may not work well. For those saying its cheaply made, well you get what you pay for. My opinion is that it feels solid enough in my hands and I highly doubt it will break any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Look like they dipped the ends in paint and let it dripped dry. So all the tips are sharp. Very painful to brush against the scalp. I ended up using 800 sand paper and roll this thing around until the sharp ends round off. It is much better but still painful and I don't want to completly remove the ends.
customer_reviews.author: NothingFree

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my beard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help dry/straighten my beard. I've been using it for about a week and it has been great. Puts the right amount of tension on the hair to lock in the straightening effect in combo with the dryer but doesnt tug the hairs. The decal on the handle has started to fade but I'm not showing this thing off to anyone. Overall it has worked great so far...let's hope it last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great for thin and fine hair.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. I have thin, fine hair - and struggled to find a brush that I could use when drying/styling my hair without getting hair breakage in the process. This brush "fits the bill".
customer_reviews.author: Karen N.

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Guys, you need this brush! If you have straight hair and with an upper cut style, it is perfect! Combine with a sea salt spray and you will receive great confidence.
customer_reviews.author: AdChe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for pompadours and combovers
customer_reviews.text: I work as a barber and have been looking for the perfect sized round brush for pompadours and combovers. I definitely found it in this brush, it’s perfect. My new favorite tool
customer_reviews.author: JEgert

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: At first it did the job, sure, after a few months (4-5) the little balls on the ends start falling off. Don't bother with this one.
customer_reviews.author: EvaH960

customer_reviews.title: Great Grooming Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Great way to comb and brush hair. The roll feature makes it really easy to part. I like how stiff the bristles are. Great little grooming gadget
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Used to be better quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of this item I have purchased and the quality has gone way down. I had the previous one for years but this one has begun leaving red chips in my hair (from the red balls at the end of each bristle) after only a couple months whereas my previous one lasted years without ever flaking. Just replaced it because too much hair got caught around it. Otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.author: Keon

product_meta.title: Uppercut Deluxe Quiff Roller, Non-Slip Hairbrush
feature_bullets: A high quality, Small, round brush with ball tipped bristles designed to add life and volume.
For guys whose hair style needs more volume.
Precision design – Perfectly sized and wall tipped bristles spaced for air circulation prevent pulling. Rubber non-slip grip for easier glide and better control.
The perfect lift-off brush for more height in your quiff, more lift in your pomp and more air in your hair.
